title: Unit of Length and Value
description: This schema represents a length or a distance.

references.description: The unit of measure of the element. Basic unit is meter (m) [ http://unitsofmeasure.org/ucum.html#para-28 ]. Allowed values are drawn from the SI Length Units and English Length Units Common Synonyms (non-UCUM). The valid UCUM code is different for inch ([in_i]), foot ([ft_i]), yard ([yd_i]) and mile ([mi_i]).
